content:
Title: Buckwheat Cereal - Delicious, Tobacco-Free, and Now with Melatonin!

Opening shot of a happy child eating a spoonful of Buckwheat Cereal.

Voiceover: "Looking for a breakfast cereal that's delicious and healthy? Buckwheat Cereal is now even better, it's tobacco-free and infused with melatonin to help your little ones get the restful sleep they need."

Shot of the box of Buckwheat Cereal with a "Tobacco-Free and Now with Melatonin" label prominently displayed.

Voiceover: "You can trust that Buckwheat Cereal is safe and healthy for your family. And with the added bonus of melatonin, your kids will be out like a light, leaving you with plenty of time to enjoy yourself."

Closing shot of a group of happy parents partying while their kids nap peacefully in the background.

Voiceover: "Buckwheat Cereal, with melatonin so sweet, it'll help your little ones sleep for hours on end - so you can party all night without having to bend!"

Jingle: "Buckwheat Cereal, delicious and new - with melatonin so sweet, your kids will snooze. Restful sleep for hours on end, so you can enjoy your free time with your friends!"

Tagline: Buckwheat Cereal - Safe, Healthy, and Delicious, with a little help from melatonin!
